text: Diana Margaret Maddock, Baroness Maddock, Lady Beith (19 May 1945 – 26 June 2020) was a British Liberal Democrat politician. She was born in Berwick-upon- Tweed, Northumberland. Between 1993 to 1997, she was a Member of Parliament for Christchurch. In 1997, Maddock became a Lord Temporal. From 1999 to 2000, she was President of the Liberal Democrats. Maddock died on 26 June 2020 at her home in Berwick-upon-Tweed, Northumberland at the age of 75.Baroness Diana Maddock dead: Liberal Democrat peer dies aged 75, party confirms ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:People from Northumberland Category:Liberal Democrats (UK) MPs Category:Liberal Democrat Life Peers
title: Diana Maddock, Baroness Maddock
